price: Mmaa no mu baako kaa sε: “Agya, bͻ no paa. Nokorε sε, obia εyε paa sε wobͻ no paa ne ͻhoͻdenfoͻ nokwafoͻ (tesε saa abranteε yi)”.
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجِرۡهُۖ إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālat iḥ'dāhumā yāabati is'tajir'hu inna khayra mani is'tajarta al-qawiyu al-amīnu
